Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is spotted with a brown resinous deposit, the exterior, which is slightly grooved, is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of black and red painted texts.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394919) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394919)
